query:
SELECT b.id, b.room_type_id, b.guest_name, b.status, rt.name as room_name 
FROM bookings b 
LEFT JOIN room_types rt ON b.room_type_id = rt.id 
ORDER BY b.id DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4C7dh5n6yXuaUbo.root --database Un9ncnuBxgCCtamkr3qHdr --execute SELECT b.id, b.room_type_id, b.guest_name, b.status, rt.name as room_name 
FROM bookings b 
LEFT JOIN room_types rt ON b.room_type_id = rt.id 
ORDER BY b.id DESC;
